description: The Canon EF 28-105mm standard zoom lens retains the optical capability of Canon's previous EF 28-105mm USM lens but with a refined exterior design. The lens is distinguished by a ring-type ultra-sonic monitor (USM) drive that provides silent, high-speed autofocusing, along with full-time manual focusing. The 1.6-foot close-focusing distance, meanwhile, lets you take great close-up portraits and nature shots. A good match for the Canon EOS A2/A2e or ELAN 7 series cameras with built-in flashes, the EF 28-105mm lens is an excellent zoom lens for everyday use. The lens carries a one-year warranty.Focal length: 28-105mmMaximum aperture: 1:3.5-4.5Lens construction: 15 elements in 12 groupsDiagonal angle of view: 75 to 23 degrees (at 30 feet)Focus adjustment: Inner focusing system with USMClosest focusing distance: 1.6 feetZoom system: Rotating typeFilter size: 58mmDimensions: 2.8 inches in diameter, 3 inches longWeight: 13.2 ounces
title: Canon EF 28-105mm f/3.5-4.5 II USM Standard Zoom Lens for Canon SLR Cameras
